game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map leads you to an unexplored ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to find and retrieve the lost artifact that's said to possess immense power.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Enter the jungle and locate the ruins.
task.description: You must navigate through the dense jungle, avoiding dangerous wildlife and natural hazards, to reach the ruins.

task.objective: Decipher the runes on the entrance portal.
task.description: The entrance to the ruins is guarded by ancient runes that must be deciphered to unlock it.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and find the artifact.
task.description: Navigate the maze-like ruins, solving puzzles and evading traps to reach the chamber where the artifact is hidden.
